name: Learn: Days of the Week
description:
With Learn: Days of the Week your kid will be able to learn the days. 

Includes two modes:

1. Learn

  • Touch the days of the week to hear the pronunciation
  • Spelling for the days are also shown

2. Challenge

  • Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.
  • Challenge types:
  1. Sequence - Select the days that goes before, after, or in-between other days.
  • Days to match can be configured in settings.

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
